review.title: “Junior Account Manager Intership”
review.pros: Pros – Nice place to work in. Young and friendly team.
review.cons: Cons – Many different task to be carried out, from phone calls to sending email to writing technical analysis.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Nice start for a brokerage career”
review.pros: Pros – learn more about financial markets; monitor their evolution; daily analysis and briefing sessions; build on sales skills; enhance self-confidence during telephone conversations
review.cons: Cons – work gets boring after a while; training starts with the very basics; training is not so in-depth; knowledge acquired in intermediate level; just sales skills are utilized most of the time
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “For a beginner its ok.”
review.pros: Pros – The support and time given is good. Theres a scope for freshers as they can share there ideas. You dont have to be under pressure while working.
review.cons: Cons – The approach should be more positive and a lot has to be done by the technical analyst in each and every currency pair and commodities.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Get a better analyst or have four analyst working and focusing on different pairs and commodities and should be well aware of the present global scenario.
